detail_desc: Fitted, turtleneck top in ribbed jersey with long raglan sleeves.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Blouse in satin with a square neckline, seam under the bust and pleated section at the front. Smocking at the back, and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the top and an elasticated seam, smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Lined front.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dolman sleeves, close-fitting cuffs and a rounded hem. No buttons.
Short chunky metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
V-neck top in slub jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with lace details. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, fully lined bikini top with detachable spaghetti shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck. Clean finish at the edges with folded seams, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, side support, decorative gathers in the sides, and wide adjustable shoulder straps.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Lace push-up bralette with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Socks in soft, fine-knit merino wool with elasticated tops.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with press-studs, a chest pocket and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Metal earrings in the shape of a face in profile. Length 8 cm.
Skirt in a viscose weave with a smocked waist and tiers with overlocked edges. Unlined.

Long, sleeveless dress in softly draping silk with a sheen. Straight cut at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and inset panels at the sides for extra width at the hem. Two high slits front and back. Cotton lining.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with space for breast forms. Adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and straight legs with creases.
Dungaree shorts in washed stretch twill with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Mittens in soft, rib-knit wool. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 21 pairs of studs, three pairs of hoop earrings and one pair of earrings with a pendant. Size from approx. 0.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
Jazz trousers in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders with raw-edge seams and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded, ribbed hem. Longer at the back.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a soft silky feel. High waist with a concealed zip in one side and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Ballet pumps with a decorative elastic bow on the front with metal tips. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles.

Outdoor tights in fast-drying functional fabric with sections in a stretch weave. Elasticated drawstring waist, a zipped leg pocket and ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees. Reflective details.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Lined pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with a drawstring waistband, side pockets, and decorative seams at the knees.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, double-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Buttons at the cuffs and a high-cut single back vent. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy jersey.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Short dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with lace details at the top and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with elastication, a decorative drawstring and flounce at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.

Long-sleeved boiler suit in washed cotton denim with a collar, zip down the front and elasticated seam at the waist. Open chest pockets and back pockets, patch front pockets and a concealed press-stud at the cuffs.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Body chain with recycled glass beads and reconstituted stones in chakra colours. Adjustable sizes around the neck and waist.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long, rib-knit raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy jacquard weave with a small, frilled collar, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and long balloon sleeves with narrow, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with large, reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, satin linings and cork wedge heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Longer down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Elastic hairband with large, decorative flowers.

Set with a hat and mittens in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing. Both hat and mittens have a fleece lining.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar, small frill trim around the armholes, buttons down the front and ties at the front of the hem.
Boxy, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Small shoulder bag in braided water hyacinth with a wide, patterned tie at the top, a braided shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 9.5x17.5x24.5 cm.
Heart-shaped sunglasses with slim metal and plastic frames, adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Side support with decorative gathers. No fasteners.
Elasticated hairbands in various materials and designs with a decorative bow.
Blouse in airy, crinkled voile made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Round opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and short, puff sleeves with elasticated hems.
Straight-cut jacket in cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Lightly padded, straight-cut leather jacket with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip and fasteners down the front and welt front pockets with a zip. Rounded shoulders and sleeves with volume that taper to the cuffs where there is a concealed zip. Quilted lining in a contrasting colour.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist with wide elastication, a fake fly and pockets in the side seams with metal details.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in fluted, crinkled fabric with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a wide, gathered neckline front and back and lace sections over the shoulders.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Joggers in woven fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, zipped side pockets and jetted back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The joggers incorporate COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
